Package peril.model.board

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ModelArmy
    Encapsulates the behaviour of a collection of ModelUnits.
    ModelBoard
    Encapsulates the behaviour of the the game board.
    ModelContinent
    Encapsulates the behaviour of a continent on the ModelBoard which consists of a Set of ModelCountrys.
    ModelCountry
    Encapsulates the behaviour of a country that has a ModelArmy.
    ModelUnit
    A unit that is part of a ModelArmy.
    Test_ModelArmy
    Tests ModelArmy.
    Test_ModelContinent
    This test class ensures that ModelContinent functions correctly properly.
    Test_ModelCountry
    This class tests ModelCountry.
    Test_ModelHazard
    This class tests ModelHazard.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ModelHazard
    These may occur once a turn and will kill a random percentage of the army stationed an ModelContinent.
